data.question: You're on your 3rd holiday! What are your plans for the holidays?
data.btn1: Gather up!!! Travel with your friends for 3 days and 2 nights
data.btn2: I relieve my fatigue by sleeping

data.question: You can see someone approaching me from afar. What about you?
data.btn1: I don't care it, just go on my way
data.btn2: Change the route I was moving

data.question: You participated in the game... Someone took your food. And you?
data.btn1: What kind of fuck is that? I'll find the him.
data.btn2: Imagine how hungry he was. I'm going to starve this time.

data.question: A lot of people died in a murder in the building in front of my house. and next day?
data.btn2: Just in case it's annoying... I'll avoid there for a while.

data.question: You picked up the death note by chance. And you?
data.btn1: Wow... Is it real? Can't believe it.
data.btn2: The people I hated so far are passing by in my head.

data.question: You are in the cafe to kill time. What will you do?
data.btn1: I recharge my energy by watching fun videos.
data.btn2: I draw pictures or read books.

data.question: I saw a part-timer being scolded by the boss at the cafe. What do you think?
data.btn1: I wonder what he did wrong.
data.btn2: It must be hard to work, but I feel bad for him to be scolded by the boss.

data.question: What is important point when you buy a cell phone?
data.btn1: Of course, the performance and screen!
data.btn2: I want to buy it when the design is pretty

data.question: my friend passed the test that he was looking forward to. What will you say to him?
data.btn1: Wow, you studied really hard. Congratulations!
data.btn2: I knew you'd get in! Do you want chicken and beer with me?

data.question: you have to go to drive to a restaurant far away. What is your plan?
data.btn1: I can park anywhere near the restaurant. Let's go.
data.btn2: It's uncomfortable if there's no parking space. I'll call the restaurant before start.

data.question: How messy is your desk now?
data.btn1: Don't say it's messy. I have my own rules!
data.btn2: Neat and clean. I always leave what I used in place.

data.question: I received a business card with ○△□ written on it. What should you do?
data.btn2: Search for the same phone number on the Google.
